About Me

About

  • 2018 - Present

    Software Engineer

    Textron Systems
    • Develop control software for Advanced Architecture Phase Amplitude and Time Simulator (A2PATS)
    • Design and implementation of a multiple systems communication using a Master-Subordinate structure through networking
    • Contributions to the software development and successful release of a Real Time RF Recorder
    • Mentored and trained employees through overseeing tasks and providing guidance

  • Summer 2017

    Research Assistant

    College of Engineer, University of Michigan

    Tried to predict mood from speech attributes (activation and valence) of patients with bipolar by finding agreement between annotators using CCC and using support vector machine algorithm to find accuracy of mood prediction.

  • Summer 2016

    Technical Intern

    4Property
    • Produced technical outline for commercial property project, designing process steps to connect agents/buyers/sellers and led group discussion on project
    • Collaborated with IT team to launch project aimed to group properties based on various attributes. Used Microsoft SQL to manage dataset
    • Worked on UI design assisting the development of the website using CSS/HTML/PHP

  • 2014 - 2018

    University of Michigan

    Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

    GPA: 3.54

Other Roles

Young Professional Association - Textron Systems

Board Member

Plan various activities to bring engagement to the young professionals in our company.

Room For All - Textron Systems

Board Member

Create a more diverse and inclusive environment in the workplace through hiring events, forum discussions, and cultural events, helping plan events throughout the year and be a liaison for the group at my location.

HKN (Eta Kappa Nu)

Tutor Chair

As tutor chair, I helped with outreach to encourage people to get involved in tutoring for Electrical Engineering or Computer Science courses. I managed the matching and scheduling process as well as participated as a tutor.
